rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0001
rows.name:
What's up, Hotaru?
You look down in the dumps.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0002
rows.name:
You all right, Hotaru?
What's up?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0003
rows.name:
Are you OK?
You don't look it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0004
rows.name:
Hey, Hotaru, what's the matter?
Cheer up!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0005
rows.name: The land is choked with sand...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0006
rows.name: Is this really Eden?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0007
rows.name:
No flowers, no trees, no grass.
Just a barren plain of rocks and sand.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0009
rows.name:
Look.
I bet that was a beautiful lake once.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0010
rows.name:
But there isn't even a drop of water
left.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0011
rows.name:
I guess this place doesn't get much
rain.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0012
rows.name:
I suppose they don't get much rain
here.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0013
rows.name: I suppose little rain falls here.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0014
rows.name: Can't imagine they get much rain here!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0015
rows.name: Water is essential for life.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0016
rows.name: But there isn't any here.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0017
rows.name: This place is completely barren.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0018
rows.name:
Some places have a drought now and
again, but they still have a little hope.
This place...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0019
rows.name: It's just...dead.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0020
rows.name: Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0021
rows.name:
Isn't there something we can do to
bring the greenery back?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0022
rows.name:
It's so sad to think that the land might 
have died forever.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0023
rows.name: Hey, Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0024
rows.name:
There must be some way to bring back
the greenery.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0025
rows.name:
It's pretty sad to think the land might
have died forever.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0026
rows.name: Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0027
rows.name:
Shall we search for a way to bring back
the greenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0028
rows.name:
It is a terrible thing to think that this
place might be sterile forever.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0029
rows.name: Hey, Hotaru.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0030
rows.name:
I wonder if there's some way to bring
back the old greenery.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0031
rows.name:
It's jolly sad to see the land so
desolate.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0101
rows.name:
No roots can take hold in sand
like this. And nothing is going to
grow without water.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0102
rows.name: Wait!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0103
rows.name: Maybe something CAN grow!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0105
rows.name: Well, you know life is a powerful thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0106
rows.name: It may be too dry for seeds here, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0107
rows.name:
...We could get some seedlings from
somewhere else and plant them here?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0108
rows.name:
...We could get some seedlings from
somewhere else and plant them here?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0109
rows.name:
...We could get some seedlings from
somewhere else and plant them here?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0110
rows.name:
...We could get some seedlings from
somewhere else and plant them here?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0111
rows.name: Yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0112
rows.name:
At first, they probably won't last very
long.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0113
rows.name:
But as plants die, their remains
fertilize the soil.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0114
rows.name:
They'll be giving their goodness back to
the next generations.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0115
rows.name:
It'll take a while. But do it enough
times...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0116
rows.name:
and eventually this dead
land can be restored to life!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0117
rows.name: Hey, there's the old Hotaru!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0118
rows.name: That's more like the Hotaru I know.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0119
rows.name:
At last. You seem to be back
to your old self.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0120
rows.name:
Heyyy, there we go!
Back to your old self!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0121
rows.name: Yes! Thank you.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0122
rows.name: I'm going to do it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0123
rows.name: I'm going to bring back the vegetation!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0201
rows.name: That's so sad...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0202
rows.name:
When nature is destroyed, life and
everything else is destroyed with it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0203
rows.name:
Don't people feel any shame when they
see places like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0204
rows.name:
All life comes from nature. All beings
should live in harmony with it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0205
rows.name:
Why don't people treat it with the
respect it deserves?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0206
rows.name:
Why do they let it fall into this state?
All life is precious, something to be
cherished!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0207
rows.name:
That's so true. Nobody realizes how
important the environment is.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0208
rows.name:
You're right. Nobody gets how
important this stuff is.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0209
rows.name:
That's true. Few realize the
importance of the environment.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0210
rows.name:
Yup, you hit the nail on the head.
Nobody gets it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0211
rows.name:
I'm a Blade, so I wasn't born from
nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0212
rows.name:
Mortals are part of nature, and I envy
them for that. But it angers me to see
them show no regard for it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0213
rows.name:
There are good humans out there, of
course. Like you.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0214
rows.name:
But mostly... I just don't
understand them.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0215
rows.name: That's OK, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0216
rows.name:
Well, it's early days. Maybe someday,
humans and Blades will come to
understand each other.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0217
rows.name: Yeah, I think you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0218
rows.name:
Maybe one day, Blades will understand
humans, and humans will understand
Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0219
rows.name: Ah, it's still early days.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0220
rows.name:
Maybe we all just need a little more
time to understand each other.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0221
rows.name: Don't worry about it!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0222
rows.name:
Maybe in time, mutual understanding
and harmony will blossom... Wow,
that's deep. I better write it down.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0223
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0224
rows.name:
I actually feel like you understand me
pretty well already.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0225
rows.name:
That's why I feel like I can keep going
even in the face of sadness.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0226
rows.name: Thank you for everything!
